name: Clog the Void
description:
Become Mr. Clogger, void splits clogging specialist employed by Crates & Blades Inc. in this physic based platformer.

If "Space" is not working try to click on screen!

Controls:

Walking: WSAD/arrows

Jump: SPACE

Reset Level: x

Next level: SPACE

Game made in 72h for Mini Game Jam 67.

Theme of the Jam was "Void", and additional limitation was "no enemies".
